title: We are hiring: Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager for performance campaigns.
job_overview:
We are hiring: Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager for performance campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month based on performance

Remote position with autonomy.

Requirements:

Focused on metrics and performance.
